Welcome to pyKiBackannSchem’s documentation!¶

Contents:

Back-annotate footprints on a Kicad schematic from the .cmp file.

Workflow¶

  • Create Initial schematic
  • Use CvPCB to associate any parts which do not have associated footprints.
  • Back annotate the schematic to match the CvPCB footprints.
  • Stop using CvPCB.

Usage¶

Program is run by either typing python pyKiBackannSchem.py or double clicking pyKiBackannSchem.py.

Output Message¶

There are three classes of messages:

  • Errors
  • Warnings
  • Notes

There are a couple of Errors:

  • No match for part

Code follows¶

class pyKiBackannSchem.ProcessKicadSchematic¶
backAnnotateSchematic(cmpList, schList)¶
Parameters:cmpList – List of components in RefDes,

$Comp L 4N26 U1 U 1 1 537A4D39 P 8200 3650 F 0 “U1” H 7986 3829 40 0000 C CNN F 1 “4N26” H 8380 3465 40 0000 C CNN F 2 “DIP6” H 8001 3470 29 0000 C CNN F 3 “” H 8200 3650 60 0000 C CNN 1 8200 3650 1 0 0 -1 $EndComp

backupSchematic(schFileName)¶

Back up the schematic file by renaming the file as _sch.bak.

Parameters:schFileName – The name of the schematic file
Returns:True if passed, exits if fails
checkSchematic(cmpList, schList)¶

Check the schematic to see what the issues are

createCmpFootPrintList(cmpList)¶

Takes the cmp file and creates a list of ref des vs footprints Component Footprint list looks like: BeginCmp TimeStamp = /537A4DC8; Reference = R4; ValeurCmp = R; IdModule = R4-5; EndCmp

Parameters:cmpList – Component file list

:returns” list of ref des and footprints

createF2LineFromF1Line(f1Line, newFootpr)¶

F 1 “4N26” H 8380 3465 40 0000 C CNN F 2 “DIP6” H 8001 3470 29 0000 C CNN

doKiSch2Cmp()¶

The executive which calls all of the other functions.

doKiSchChk()¶

The executive which calls all of the other functions.

getRefDes(line)¶
Parameters:line – The line that has the ref des, formated like ‘L 4N26 U1’
Returns:refDes String

Extract the ref des from the line and return it

readInSchematic(schFileName)¶

Read the schematic text file into a list for easier processing.

Returns:list of the lines in the schematic file
searchCmpList(refDesFromLine, cmpList)¶

Search the component list and return the footprint

Parameters:refDesFromLine – The reference designator of the current line

:returns” the new reference designator from the cmp file

selectCmpFile()¶

selectKicadSchematic() - This is the dialog which locates the Kicad Schematic files

Returns:path/name of the file that was selected
selectKicadSchematic()¶

selectKicadSchematic() - This is the dialog which locates the Kicad Schematic files

Returns:path/name of the file that was selected
subRefDes(subString, line)¶

Insert the refDes string into the line in place of the old ref des. line format is: ‘F 2 “DIP6” H 8001 3470 29 0000 C CNN’
